msgSnippet: Hi, I d really like to see something like http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/29 in JUnit. What is the current obstacle on integrating the code
messageBody:
Hi,

I'd really like to see something like
http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/29 in JUnit. What is the
current obstacle on integrating the code there? Can I help the process
along at all?

Thanks,
Max.
